mapper.select: select * from tb_order t1,tb_order_status t2,tb_order_detail t3 where t1.order_id = t2.order_id and t1.order_id = t3.order_id and t1.order_id =#{orderId};

select t1.*,t2.*,t3.*,goods.goodsName,m.shopName,m.merchantId from tb_order t1 inner join tb_order_detail t2 on t1.order_id = t2.order_id inner join tb_order_status t3 on t1.order_id = t3.order_id inner join goods on goods.goodsId=t2.goodsId inner join merchantshop m on m.merchantId=goods.possesserId where t1.user_id = #{userId};

select t1.*,t2.*,t3.*,goods.goodsName,m.shopName,m.merchantId from tb_order t1 inner join tb_order_detail t2 on t1.order_id = t2.order_id inner join tb_order_status t3 on t1.order_id = t3.order_id inner join goods on goods.goodsId=t2.goodsId inner join merchantshop m on m.merchantId=goods.possesserId where t1.user_id = #{userId} and status=#{status};

select t1.*,t2.*,t3.*,goods.goodsName,m.shopName,m.merchantId from tb_order t1 inner join tb_order_detail t2 on t1.order_id = t2.order_id inner join tb_order_status t3 on t1.order_id = t3.order_id inner join goods on goods.goodsId=t2.goodsId inner join merchantshop m on m.merchantId=goods.possesserId where t1.order_id = #{orderId};
mapper.delete: DELETE t1,t2,t3 from tb_order as t1 inner JOIN tb_order_detail as t2 ON t1.order_id = t2.order_id inner join tb_order_status as t3 on t1.order_id = t3.order_id WHERE t1.order_id = #{orderId};
mapper.update: update tb_order_status set status=#{status} where order_Id=#{orderId};
update tb_order_status set backpay=#{backpay} where order_Id=#{orderId};
mapper.insert: insert into tb_order_detail(order_id,goodsId,num,title,price,image,merchantId) values(#{orderId},#{goodsId},#{num}, (select detail from goods where goodsId=#{goodsId}), (select price from goods where goodsId=#{goodsId}), (select imgDir from goods where goodsId=#{goodsId}), (select possesserId from goods where goodsId=#{goodsId}))
mapper.select: select t1.*,t2.*,t3.*,goods.goodsName,m.shopName,m.merchantId from tb_order t1 inner join tb_order_detail t2 on t1.order_id = t2.order_id inner join tb_order_status t3 on t1.order_id = t3.order_id inner join goods on goods.goodsId=t2.goodsId inner join merchantshop m on m.merchantId=goods.possesserId where t2.merchantId=#{merchantId}
